page.title: 16The Games We Play 2
page.content:
The rules of STICKY TOFFEE __________________________ Number of people: 4 to 10 One person is 'it' and they out out their hands. Everybody else holds out their fingers and 'it' says "Iwent down to the corner shop to buy some....", and he names a commodity. If he says "Sticky Toffee" then everybody runs away. If 'it' catches someone then they have to stand still with their arms horizontally. They can be released by someone running under their arms. If someone is caught three times then they are 'it'.
Thomas Steer Bournehall JMI
